name: capa_image_lib
readme:
Capa-Image-Lib
===============

This is a Work In Progress!  

Capa Image Lib is a native wrapper around the GIL and easy-Exif native libraries to enable good and fast picture manipulation.

For the time being the repository is private but this is an opensource project.

OS Support
-----------
Currently this library was only tested on Ubuntu 16.04 ,gcc 5.4 and v6.5.0.
If you verified it on any other OS feel free to notify me.

Dependencies
-----------
apt install cmake

(optional) apt install ninja-build

npm install -g cmake-js

apt install libjpeg-dev 

apt install libpng-dev


Methods:
------------

* get_one_exif -   receives a file name and returns the exif in a json form
* get_exif     -   receives an array of file names and returns the exifs in a json form
* resize       -   

| Argument          | description | type |
|-------------------|:-----------:|:-----:|
|original_file_name |source file name |string|
|resized_file_name  |destination file name|string|
|w              | destination file width| int|
|h  | destination file height|int|

note: the function does not create the path!


* resize_buffer       -   return a buffer of the resized picture.
The returned buffer is in the format of PNG image file format!

| Argument          | description | type |
|-------------------|:-----------:|:-----:|
|original_file_name |source file name |string|
|w              | destination file width| int|
|h  | destination file height|int|


* create_thumb       -   

| Argument          | description | type |
|-------------------|:-----------:|:-----:|
|original_file_name |source file name |string|
|resized_file_name  |destination file name|string|
|orientation|http://www.daveperrett.com/articles/2012/07/28/exif-orientation-handling-is-a-ghetto/|int|
| |taken from the exif orientation field|
|w              | destination file width| int|
|h  | destination file height|int|

note: the function does not create the path!

* cil.create_thumb_buffer - returns the thumbnail as a buffer

| Argument          | description | type |
|-------------------|:-----------:|:-----:|
|original_file_name |source file name |string|
|orientation|http://www.daveperrett.com/articles/2012/07/28/exif-orientation-handling-is-a-ghetto/|int|
| |taken from the exif orientation field|
|w              | destination file width| int|
|h  | destination file height|int|

* get_picture_info - Get information about the picture such as Width and Height.
This function should be used as a fallback function when the image has no EXIF data.


Example
-------
`var cil = require("capa_image_lib")`

`cil.resize("source_file.jpg","destination_file.jpg",10,10)`

Road Map
--------
* Tests
* Add "batch" methods for create_thumb and resize.
* Add Support for more file types.
* Basic Image tools and filters such as crop, brightness, etc.
* Extract data from images such as channels, histogram, etc.
